name: Flick Swing
description:
Fun & joy of air hockey now available on mobile!

You will feel the air breeze on your hands while playing Flick Swing!

Challenge yourself and see how good you are…

HOW to PLAY?
Slide left & right and catch the ball, then release it on right time to beat your opponent.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
